definitions.definition: To put in a hovel; to shelter .
To construct a chimney so as to prevent smoking, by making two of the more exposed walls higher than the others, or making an opening on one side near the top.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To put in a hovel; to shelter .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To construct a chimney so as to prevent smoking, by making two of the more exposed walls higher than the others, or making an opening on one side near the top.
